DialogueText.Text: Welcome back! I have someone I'd like to intoduce you to here.
This is one of my Apostles. I'd like you two to get acquainted; as you'll need to learn to work alongside the others if you wish to join the ranks of my loyal Apostles.
As such, the both of you will be taking on this next mission. I hope it'll prove to be a enjoyable teambuilding exercise!
What do you wish of us, Master?

I need the both of you to investigate something for me. A strange infestation has stained the surface known as the Astral Infection. I know little of its origins, and that is something I'd like rectified. I trust you can handle deploying a Siphon in the area, my loyal Apostle?
As for you, my friend, follow your senior's lead, and all should go well! I'll leave it to them to explain the finer details of your mission. Go have a talk with them!
Ah, welcome! Congratulations on making it back in one piece! I take it you found the whereabouts of those cultists?

...?! Oh my... So that's what became of them? Such blind and foolish faith they hold in those beasts. I wonder if anything of who they once were is left inside those monsters? Or maybe their devotion carries on even through their metamorphosis...

Questions for another day, I suppose. You've done very well, but I have one final mission in mind for you. This one though won't be a test of your ability; that you've more than proven. I'll inform you of the details when next we meet.
